Class TimeBasedExerciseEntry

java.lang.Object
object.Entry
object.ExerciseEntry
object.TimeBasedExerciseEntry
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
public class TimeBasedExerciseEntry extends ExerciseEntry
Represents an exercise entry where calories burned are based on duration (in minutes).

A TimeBasedExerciseEntry specifies the sport activity, the userâ€™s weight, and the total duration of the activity in minutes. This class extends ExerciseEntry and calculates calories burned using the MET value of the sport, the userâ€™s weight, and the total exercise duration.

  • Constructor Details

    • TimeBasedExerciseEntry

      public TimeBasedExerciseEntry(Entry.EntryType type, String note, Sport sport, double weight, double duration)
      Creates a new TimeBasedExerciseEntry.
      Parameters:
      type - the type of entry (planned, planned complete, or recorded)
      note - an optional note or description for the entry
      sport - the sport or activity associated with this entry
      weight - the weight (kg) of the person performing the exercise, used for calorie calculation
      duration - the duration of the exercise in minutes

  • Method Details

    • clone

      Returns:
      a cloned TimeBasedExerciseEntry instance

    • calculateCalories

      public double calculateCalories()
      Calculates the calories burned during the exercise.

      The calculation is based on the duration (converted to hours), the userâ€™s weight, and the MET value of the sport.

      The result is returned as a negative value to represent net calorie expenditure.

      Specified by:
      calculateCalories in class Entry
      Returns:
      the calculated calories burned as a negative number

    • getDisplayInfo

      public String getDisplayInfo()
      Returns a human-readable summary of this exercise.

      Example: "30.0 min â€¢ 250.0 kcal"

      Specified by:
      getDisplayInfo in class Entry
      Returns:
      a formatted string with duration in minutes and positive calories burned

    • updateFrom

      public void updateFrom(Entry newEntry)
      Updates this time-based exercise entry with values from another entry.

      The new entry must be a TimeBasedExerciseEntry, otherwise an exception is thrown. The identifier is not changed.

      Overrides:
      updateFrom in class ExerciseEntry
      Parameters:
      newEntry - the entry to copy values from
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if newEntry is not a TimeBasedExerciseEntry

    • validate

      public void validate()
      Validates this entry.

      Both weight and duration must be greater than 0.

      Specified by:
      validate in class Entry
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if weight or duration is less than or equal to 0
